channel.title: Mods other than HL's
channel.description:
I know there's already some other mod threads, but this thread are about the good mods that are [b]NOT FOR HALF LIFE[/b]. There's other games out there that have good mods such as:
Shockwave (C&C Generals:Zero Hour) [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/cc-shockwave']https://www.moddb.com/mods/cc-shockwave[/url]
Eastern Front (Company of Heroes) [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/coheastern-front']https://www.moddb.com/mods/coheastern-front[/url]
Europa Barbarorum (Rome Total War) (best mod ever!) [url='https://www.europabarbarorum.com/']https://www.europabarbarorum.com/[/url]
Lord of The Rings Total War (Rome Total War) [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/the-lord-of-the-rings-total-war']https://www.moddb.com/mods/the-lord-of-the-rings-total-war[/url]
Napoleonic Era (Age of Empires 3) [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/napoleonic-era']https://www.moddb.com/mods/napoleonic-era[/url]
Project Reality (Battlefield 2) (best mod ever no.2) [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/project-reality']https://www.moddb.com/mods/project-reality[/url]
Forgotten Hope 2 (Battlefield 2) [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/forgotten-hope-2']https://www.moddb.com/mods/forgotten-hope-2[/url]
Battlegroup 42 (Battlefield 1942) [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/battlegroup42']https://www.moddb.com/mods/battlegroup42[/url]
SWBF Conversion Pack (Star Wars Battlefront 2) [url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/star-wars-battlefront-conversion-pack']https://www.moddb.com/mods/star-wars-battlefront-conversion-pack[/url]

item.title: Mods other than HL's
item.dc:creator: Nerdguy
item.description:
Whoa Allied Intent Xtended (AIX) took Project reality’s place as no. 1 mod of battlefield 2… I have AIX too (kinda awesome) but never thought PR would get beaten

Read full topic

item.title: Mods other than HL's
item.dc:creator: Lukagerm
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

I know a great self-made mod (total conversion) for a game called real life.
There’s no need to download anything, no specific requirements, just follow these simple install steps:

-Open the window. The higher the floor, the better
-Grab your 1337 gaming rig
-Throw it out the window

Removes annoying bugs and adds a lot of great things like vast open environments and non-linearity, thus improving the experience 3000%.
No virus 100%. Satisfaction guaranteed.

P.S. There’s a second install path if arm strength requirements are too high for you.

-Shut down your 1337 gaming rig
-Switch voltage from 220 to 110 (or vice versa, depending on what you currently have) on the back of your rig’s power supply box.
-Press power button on your 1337 gaming rig

Along with features listed above, this method has a one-time mod intro bonus featuring a bright flash, a loud bang and a funky smell of stuff burning in your nose, pumping your adrenaline levels up to impressive levels. Effect has an added +5 boost if you are a pyromaniac like me. Awesome.

This made me realise I haven’t left the house since Monday

Read full topic

item.title: Mods other than HL's
item.dc:creator: vand3537
item.description:
I’ve got to go get C&C Generals again, back in the day I thought it was the downfall of the C&C franchise, but now I’m starting to remember it quit fondly. Playing Starcraft 2 has made me really miss the days of Command and Conquer and Age of Empires and such, real RTS games, Starcraft isn’t RTS, it’s an FPS with multiple units, it’s an MPS

Read full topic
